CustomField.description: Formula to return to show the approvers needed to keep opporutnities moving towards closure.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Status_Of_Approval_Request__c , "Approval Submitted", "Boni/Beth", "Approved By Sales", "Susan", "Approved By Legal, Need Finance and Sales VP Approval", "Abe/Maha", "Approved By Operations", "Abe/Maha", "Approved - Contract Record Update Pending", "Susan", "")
CustomField.label: Waiting on Approver
